articles.author: Kristen Rogers and Jacqueline Howard, CNN
articles.title: Here's the type and amount of exercise you need, WHO advises - CNN
articles.description: While we're all cooped up during the pandemic that's wreaking havoc around the world, the World Health Organization released new physical activity guidelines. Here's what they recommend according to your age, ability and circumstance.
